text: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.

verses: 13 For you were called to freedom, brothers. Only do not use your freedom as an opportunity for the flesh, but through love serve one another.

tblog.title: The Making of mDirt
tblog.summary: mDirt is probably my most ambitious project yet (though that isn't saying much). Learn how I built it.
